step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands, but try to keep your elbows closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Keep focusing on that upright posture and relaxed neck.
Good job reversing the motion. Return to the starting position smoothly.
Second rep, starting strong! Hands clasped in your lap, ready to go.
You're bringing your hands up, but let's focus on keeping those elbows tucked in a bit more as they move towards your forehead.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain that upright head position.
Holding the stretch well. Keep your shoulders relaxed and chest open.
Great job completing the second rep by returning to the start. You're doing well!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands, and spread them wide behind your head while keeping your head upright. This helps improve shoulder and chest flexibility.
